message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. I believe it will greatly benefit your business operations. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $950,000.

Alice,  your product is enticing, but $950,000 is still a bit steep for me. Given my budget and the value I see in the product, I'm willing to offer $900,000. I believe this is a fair price that benefits both of us. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. In light of your offer, I would like to extend a counteroffer of $975,000. This price reflects the value of the product and allows us to maintain a mutually beneficial transaction. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of our requirements.
